sourceText: How am I going to get through this?
text: How am I going to get through this?

sourceText: Whatever it is, I am okay.
text: Whatever it is, I am okay.

sourceText: Notice when you are feeling upset.
text: Notice when you are feeling upset.

sourceText: Even 5 deep breaths can make a big difference.
text: Even 5 deep breaths can make a big difference.

sourceText: I can do this. We will get through it together.
text: I can do this. We will get through it together.
